channel.title: Verizon port forwarding
channel.description:
I need help doing port forward on verizon. The picture below is as far as I've gotten.
http://i37.tinypic.com/kdwdgi.jpg
The TCP>43594>43594 is my port details. The picture below is a picture for my gateway IP. I censored out the network address so people can't get my IP
http://i36.tinypic.com/rw4fms.jpg
If anyone knows what I'm supposed to change the details to please post them here or email me
b.c._rich_slayer@hotmail.com
Other Notes: I've also had it set to TCP>43594>Any, not sure if that helps though.

item.title: Verizon port forwarding
